questions.question: You are an researcher interested in finding out what times of the day people are the sleepiest. Which technique would allow you to collect the most data with the greatest accuracy?
What is the single biggest problem with asking the previous question ('Which quarter would you prefer CS 147 to be offered?') to students in this year's class?
choices: We are asking a biased sample of target users.
Current students do not generalize to future students.
questions.answer: We are asking a biased sample of target users.

questions.question: Which technique is most appropriate for  Testing multiple interfaces to identify sources of confusion or inefficiency?
Which technique is most appropriate for Capturing the task context and physical setting where your product will be used?
Which technique is most appropriate for Communicating interface details to other team members.
Which technique is most appropriate for Getting user feedback on an interactive, working system.
Which technique is most appropriate for Capturing user motivations and emotions around the use of your product.
Forking a Github repository...
choices: Clones it into your online account
Prevents you from making your own changes without affecting the master
Automatically updates the master with your changes
questions.answer: Clones it into your online account

questions.question: Adding class='quiz' to an HTML element...
choices: Applies any styling with the selector '.quiz' in your linked CSS files.
Removes all non-quiz styling the element may have.
Only works on <div>, <a>, and header elements.
questions.answer: Applies any styling with the selector '.quiz' in your linked CSS files.

questions.question: Which Javascript code does the following? Find the element with ID 'submitBtn' and listen for clicks on the button. When a user clicks on the button, it should call the function called 'updateAccounts'.
Adding id='id' to an HTML element...
choices: Applies any styling with the selector 'id' in your linked CSS files.
Allows you to listen to the element in javascript by id
Can only be done in the body of the html file
questions.answer: Applies any styling with the selector 'id' in your linked CSS files.

questions.question: What does an 'href' add to a webpage?

choices: A dividend left over by an object

choices: How large the point of a pen used to be
How large letter blocks were in printing
How many points it took to write a letter
questions.answer: How large letter blocks were in printing

questions.question: What is leading?
choices: The space between the bottom of the letter and end of a block
The space between the top of the letter and the start of a block
The space between two letter blocks
questions.answer: The space between two letter blocks

questions.question: What does x-height measure?
choices: The height of any small letter
The height of an arbitrary letter

choices: Stanford did an experiment with middle schoolers and math word problems

questions.question: The idea that conflicting signals take longer to process is called
Baskerville was a reputation building font is whose campaign?
What is information scent?
choices: The ease of figuring out what's on an interface
questions.answer: The ease of figuring out what's on an interface

questions.question: What makes it difficult to navigate certain icons?
choices: New, vague menus appearing when hovered over
questions.answer: New, vague menus appearing when hovered over

questions.question: Which of the following would be the least helpful icon?
Which would be the worst spot to place important information on Google search results?

choices: Using the same text in a layout that promotes scanning
Change the order of the sentences

questions.question: What is the main fascination about grids?
What's most wrong with centering a table of contents without alignment?
What is the best reason to use top-alignment for sign-ins?
choices: People are used to these fields
It's not a table of contents
questions.answer: People are used to these fields

questions.question: Why should you design in grayscale first?
choices: It's hard to find colors you like
Nice to think about colors after seeing luminance
questions.answer: Nice to think about colors after seeing luminance
